#1.固定的设定,不要动,请咨询Broadcom
manfid=0x2d0
prodid=0x05de
vendid=0x14e4
devid=0x4380
boardtype=0x05de
boardrev=0x1230
boardnum=22
macaddr=00:90:4c:c5:12:38
sromrev=3

#2.晶体频率和国家码, 请华为软件/射频人员自行调整
xtalfreq=37400
ccode=HK

#3.固定的设定,不要动,请咨询Broadcom
nocrc=1
ag0=255
aa2g=1
pa0itssit=0x20

#4.2g的pa校准参数和功率上限,每个项目不一样,RF工程师决定
pa0b0=0x1aa4
pa0b1=0xfd4f
pa0b2=0xffe3
tssifloor2g=34
txidxcap2g=30

#5.5g的pa校准参数和功率上限,每个项目不一样,RF工程师决定
pa1lob0=10627
pa1lob1=-1069
pa1lob2=110
txidxcap5g=40
tssifloor5gl=45
pa1b0=10803
pa1b1=-1086
pa1b2=162
tssifloor5gm=45
pa1hib0=10562
pa1hib1=-1121
pa1hib2=130
tssifloor5gh=45
#6.固定的设定,不要动,请咨询Broadcom
rxpo5g=0
extpagain2g=2
extpagain5g=2
rssismf2g=0xf
rssismc2g=0x8
rssisav2g=0x1
rssismf5g=0xf
rssismc5g=0x8
rssisav5g=0x1
cckPwrOffset=0
cckPwrOffset40=14

#7.目标功率设定,每个项目不一样,RF工程师决定
maxp2ga0=0x4a
ofdm2gpo=0x22222222
mcs2gpo0=0x4444
mcs2gpo1=0x4444
maxp5gla0=0x46
ofdm5glpo=0x00000000
mcs5glpo0=0x2222
mcs5glpo1=0x2222
maxp5ga0=0x46
ofdm5gpo=0x00000000
mcs5gpo0=0x2222
mcs5gpo1=0x2222
maxp5gha0=0x48
ofdm5ghpo=0x00000000
mcs5ghpo0=0x2222
mcs5ghpo1=0x2222

#8.固定的设定,不要动,请咨询Broadcom
il0macaddr=00:90:4c:c5:12:38
wl0id=0x431b
pagc2g=0x10
dacrate2xen=1
txalpfbyp=1
txalpfpu=1

#9.天线开关,每个项目不一样,RF工程师决定
swctrlmap_2g=0x00400040,0x00030001,0x00010001,0x040301,0x1FF
swctrlmap_5g=0x00080008,0x00300010,0x00100010,0x040301,0x2F8

#10.固定的设定,不要动,请咨询Broadcom
gain=26
triso2g=8
triso5g=8

#11.固定的设定,不要动,请咨询Broadcom
hostwake=0x40
hostrdy=0x41
usbrdy=0x03
usbrdydelay=100
deadman_to=0xffffffff

#12. OOB设定,软件工程师决定
muxenab=0x2
sd_gpout=4
sd_oobonly=1
sd_level_trigger=1

#13.固定的设定,不要动,请咨询Broadcom
loflag=1
txiqlopapu2g=0
dlorange_lowlimit=5
dacpu.fab.4=1

#14.共存设定,可能每个项目不一样,软件工程师决定
boardflags=0x10081a01
btc_params1=7500
btc_params8=50000
btc_params16=5000
btc_params22=1000
btc_params48=50000
